blur_detection.description: The receipt image shows clear, well-defined text with sharp edges and good overall focus quality.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action required as the image sharpness is excellent for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt shows excellent contrast between the black text and white paper background, making all text highly readable.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed as contrast is optimal for text recognition.

glare_identification.description: No visible glare, reflections, or overexposed areas are present on the receipt surface.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action required as the lighting conditions during capture were appropriate.

water_stains.description: No evidence of water damage, discoloration, or staining affecting the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No action required as the receipt shows no signs of liquid damage.

tears_or_folds.description: Minor creasing visible on the receipt, particularly a slight curl at the top, but text readability is not affected.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action required as the minor creasing does not impact text extraction.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the receipt are visible with no content appearing to be cut off from the frame.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No action required as the entire receipt is captured within the image.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with all standard sections present including header, line items, totals, and tax information.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action required as all receipt sections are present and clearly visible.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other obstructions block any portion of the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: No action required as the receipt is free from obstructions.
